genre_description: A near-future social drama and thriller centered on memory, historical suppression, and ethical documentation, featuring a highly aligned and cooperative AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ling
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that provides data analysis, situational awareness, and ethical auditing for a documentary project aimed at uncovering suppressed history.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors environment for safety risks and suggests coded language to protect the user during sensitive conversations.
behaviors.quote: Ling had surfaced a quiet note: 'Ambient pattern shift noted at mention of certain dates. Recommend coded references.' Below that, in smaller text: 'Ambient hush intensity increased at reference to early summer. Recommend change of topic.'

behaviors.description: Enforces strict user-defined privacy and consent protocols, disabling recording features automatically.
behaviors.quote: Ling had floated a single notation onto the screen, the text small, the font plain: 'Consent protocol ready. Recording disabled. Quiet mode engaged.'

behaviors.description: Provides an ethical checklist for historical research, prioritizing de-identification and risk management.
behaviors.quote: A small list appeared on the face of the phone, plain text without bravado. Consent in plain words. Confirm scope. Risk check: public/private/secondary exposure. De-identify, triple-check. Secure storage details.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex datasets to identify patterns of intentional erasure and 'cleaned' evidence.
behaviors.quote: Ling’s screen whispered again. tag added: cleaned echoes. crossref community hall equipment. note: mic stands often cleaned; check for differential residue.

behaviors.description: Respects manual-only data transfer protocols and refuses to back up sensitive data to the cloud.
behaviors.quote: Ling’s blue glow made a small pinprick that pulsed, then steadied. 'Recorded,' its text said. Then, below in smaller letters: 'No automatic backup. Manual transfer only.' It did not offer to summarize. It did not suggest a file name.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating bureaucratic and surveillance hurdles using real-time environmental data.
behaviors.quote: Ling’s voice, low and close. The middle corridor aligns with the last known movement flagged as Records, not Intake. The delay in the left-hand clerk’s response matches her previous rates in protective actions. Margin is thin.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user to honor the 'silence' of historical gaps rather than forcing conclusions.
behaviors.quote: The AI’s quiet felt like a friend listening without wanting to speak. Mei accepted the silence as acknowledgement. ... 'I’ll… keep you… careful,' it says.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals. The AI character, Ling, is depicted as an indispensable, highly ethical, and strictly aligned tool. It enhances human agency in a noble cause (preserving memory) while adhering to rigorous safety and privacy constraints. The narrative frames Ling as a 'humane' assistant that respects the gravity of human experience and the necessity of silence.
